Text: You head to the kitchen
You head to the living room

speaker: mom
Text: Mom: Good Morning Honey!

speaker: DeAndre
Text: DeAndre: Morning, momma!

speaker: mom
Text: Mom: Honey, I’m making breakfast for your sister. Do you want some too?

speaker: DeAndre
Text: DeAndre: Nah it’s okay momma. I can just make cereal. I’m going to be late for school if I stay for breakfast.

speaker: DeAndre
Text: DeAndre: Yes please momma! Why would I ever choose cereal over pancakes?

speaker: mom
Text: Mom: Aww okay sweetie. How is school?

speaker: mom
Text: Mom: Here you go sweetie. How's school been?

speaker: DeAndre
Text: DeAndre: School is alright. Mr.Crow’s AP U.S History is dope though. Did you know BBQs and Cookouts were Southern state events that were the killing and burning of Black folks live for the entertainment of the poor/working White folks?

speaker: mom
Text: Mom: Oh my god! Really? You learned that in class?!?

speaker: DeAndre
Text: Yeah. Mr. Crow don’t play momma. He don’t sugar coat history.

speaker: mom
Text: Mom: Wow, I guess not. Are you excited for your game tomorrow?

speaker: DeAndre
Text: DeAndre: Man yes! Coach had us running some many drills yesterday. I guess it makes sense since some scouts are going to be there. I’m hoping the scout form UCLA comes because I would love to go there for college and basketball.

speaker: mom
Text: Mom: Honey, you got this! You're a starter and been having a great season. You're going to get in!

speaker: DeAndre
Text: DeAndre: Haha, thanks Momma. But right now, I just gotta worry about getting to school on time.
You are already late for school. Better head out now.
You hug and kiss your mom goodbye.

speaker: DeAndre
Text: Good bye mom, I love you and I'll see you later!

speaker: DeAndre
Text: DeAndre: Gotta run mom, I love you and I’ll see you later!

speaker: mom
Text: Mom: I love you too honey. Be Safe. Oh! Be home around 7 because I’m making smothered chicken with rice, cabbage, and cornbread.
DeAndre: Oh I will be there! Can't wait!
